link.title: Eureka School District 44-1
link.script:

p.em: Providing a positive learning environment that prepares
each student to succeed in a changing world.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Due to COVID-19, Governor Noem has closed all public school districts for the remainder of the school year. The Eureka School District is currently implementing flex learning. Please stay up to date with the school's announcements through the school's website, twitter feed, and facebook. Thank you!
